description: Returns detailed information about an extension that has been registered. If you specify a VersionId, DescribeType returns information about that specific extension version. Otherwise, it returns information about the default extension version.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The kind of extension. Conditional: You must specify either TypeName and Type, or Arn.

parameters.name: TypeName
parameters.description: The name of the extension. Conditional: You must specify either TypeName and Type, or Arn.

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the extension. Conditional: You must specify either TypeName and Type, or Arn.

parameters.name: VersionId
parameters.description: The ID of a specific version of the extension. The version ID is the value at the end of the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) assigned to the extension version when it is registered. If you specify a VersionId, DescribeType returns information about that specific extension version. Otherwise, it returns information about the default extension version.

parameters.name: PublisherId
parameters.description: The publisher ID of the extension publisher. Extensions provided by Amazon Web Services are not assigned a publisher ID.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the extension.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The kind of extension.

nested_items.name: TypeName
nested_items.description: The name of the extension.

nested_items.name: DefaultVersionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the default version of the extension. The default version is used when the extension version isn't specified.

nested_items.name: IsDefaultVersion
nested_items.description: Whether the specified extension version is set as the default version.

nested_items.name: TypeTestsStatus
nested_items.description: The contract test status of the registered extension version. To return the extension test status of a specific extension version, you must specify VersionId.

PASSED: The extension has passed all its contract tests. An extension must have a test status of PASSED before it can be published. For more information, see Publishing extensions to make them available for public use in the CloudFormation Command Line Interface (CLI) User Guide.
FAILED: The extension has failed one or more contract tests.
IN_PROGRESS: Contract tests are currently being performed on the extension.
NOT_TESTED: Contract tests haven't been performed on the extension.

nested_items.name: TypeTestsStatusDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the test status. To return the extension test status of a specific extension version, you must specify VersionId.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the extension.

nested_items.name: Schema
nested_items.description: The schema that defines the extension.

nested_items.name: ProvisioningType
nested_items.description: For resource type extensions, the provisioning behavior of the resource type. CloudFormation determines the provisioning type during registration, based on the types of handlers in the schema handler package submitted.
FULLY_MUTABLE: The resource type includes an update handler to process updates to the type during stack update operations.
IMMUTABLE: The resource type doesn't include an update handler, so the type can't be updated and must instead be replaced during stack update operations.
NON_PROVISIONABLE: The resource type doesn't include all the following handlers, and therefore can't actually be provisioned.
create.
read.
delete.

nested_items.name: DeprecatedStatus
nested_items.description: The deprecation status of the extension version.
LIVE: The extension is activated or registered and can be used in CloudFormation operations, dependent on its provisioning behavior and visibility scope.
DEPRECATED: The extension has been deactivated or deregistered and can no longer be used in CloudFormation operations.

nested_items.name: LoggingConfig
nested_items.description: Contains logging configuration information for private extensions. This applies only to private extensions you have registered in your account. For public extensions, both those provided by Amazon Web Services and published by third parties, CloudFormation returns null. For more information, see RegisterType.

nested_items.name: LogRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the role that CloudFormation should assume when sending log entries to CloudWatch Logs.

nested_items.name: LogGroupName
nested_items.description: The Amazon CloudWatch Logs group to which CloudFormation sends error logging information when invoking the extension's handlers.

nested_items.name: RequiredActivatedTypes
nested_items.description: For extensions that are modules, the public third-party extensions that must be activated in your account in order for the module itself to be activated.

nested_items.name: TypeNameAlias
nested_items.description: An alias assigned to the public extension, in this account and Region. If you specify an alias for the extension, CloudFormation treats the alias as the extension type name within this account and Region. You must use the alias to refer to the extension in your templates, API calls, and CloudFormation console.

nested_items.name: OriginalTypeName
nested_items.description: The type name of the public extension.

nested_items.name: PublisherId
nested_items.description: The publisher ID of the extension publisher.

nested_items.name: SupportedMajorVersions
nested_items.description: A list of the major versions of the extension type that the macro supports.
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: ExecutionRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM execution role used to register the extension. This applies only to private extensions you have registered in your account. For more information, see RegisterType.

nested_items.name: Visibility
nested_items.description: The scope at which the extension is visible and usable in CloudFormation operations.
PRIVATE: The extension is only visible and usable within the account in which it is registered. CloudFormation marks any extensions you register as PRIVATE.
PUBLIC: The extension is publicly visible and usable within any Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: SourceUrl
nested_items.description: The URL of the source code for the extension.

nested_items.name: DocumentationUrl
nested_items.description: The URL of a page providing detailed documentation for this extension.

nested_items.name: LastUpdated
nested_items.description: When the specified extension version was registered. This applies only to:
Private extensions you have registered in your account. For more information, see RegisterType.
Public extensions you have activated in your account with auto-update specified. For more information, see ActivateType.

nested_items.name: TimeCreated
nested_items.description: When the specified private extension version was registered or activated in your account.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationSchema
nested_items.description: A JSON string that represent the current configuration data for the extension in this account and Region.

nested_items.name: PublisherId
nested_items.description: The publisher ID of the extension publisher.

nested_items.name: OriginalTypeName
nested_items.description: For public extensions that have been activated for this account and Region, the type name of the public extension.

nested_items.name: OriginalTypeArn
nested_items.description: For public extensions that have been activated for this account and Region, the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the public extension.

nested_items.name: PublicVersionNumber
nested_items.description: The version number of a public third-party extension.

nested_items.name: LatestPublicVersion
nested_items.description: The latest version of a public extension that is available for use.

nested_items.name: IsActivated
nested_items.description: Whether the extension is activated in the account and Region.

nested_items.name: AutoUpdate
nested_items.description: Whether CloudFormation automatically updates the extension in this account and Region when a new minor version is published by the extension publisher. Major versions released by the publisher must be manually updated. For more information, see Automatically use new versions of extensions in the CloudFormation User Guide.
